statements: DELETE FROM Celebrities WHERE id = 1 AND name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM Celebrities WHERE nationality = 'American' AND age < 30
DELETE FROM Movies WHERE release_date < '2020-01-01' AND title LIKE '%Action%';
DELETE FROM awards WHERE award_name = 'Best Actor' AND year = 2021;
DELETE FROM followers WHERE following_id = (SELECT id FROM celebrities WHERE name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM Books WHERE author = 'Stephen King';
DELETE FROM Awards WHERE category = 'Best Actor' AND year < 2000;
DELETE FROM Songs WHERE artist = 'Taylor Swift' AND release_year > 2015;
